title: Hacker Escape Room #3786
description: A cyber-themed escape room engine built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript featuring a fully simulated terminal environment and command parser system. Players navigate a fake filesystem using real commands (cd, ls, cat, help, clear, hack), solve logic-based riddles, crack passwords through animated brute-force sequences, and progress through branching multi-level challenges under a countdown timer. Includes glitch animations, immersive sound effects, and structured state management for a realistic hacker experience.
features: Custom command parser (cd, ls, cat, help, clear, hack)
